mods.abstract: (Top) One day's shooting of canvasbacks, Havre de Grace c. 1920."(l to r) Captain John Keen, Harriet Brown, Ann Mitchell, Bob Vandiver, Mrs. Catherine Vandiver and Dorothy Hilliard."(Bottom): One morning's shoot of canvasbacks by James Currier of Havre de Grace, Md.
